name: City
description: Urban area with dense buildings and roads.

name: Forest
description: Dense vegetation providing cover and concealment.

name: Swamp
description: Wet and muddy terrain, difficult to traverse.

name: Open Field
description: Flat and unobstructed terrain, good visibility.

name: Desert
description: Hot, sandy terrain with limited cover.

name: Hills
description: Elevated terrain that gives a visibility advantage.

name: Mountains
description: Rugged terrain, hard to move through but offers cover.

name: Snowfield
description: Cold and slippery terrain with reduced visibility.
